menus.title: Fried-yam

menus.title: Abacha
menus.para: Abacha is an Eastern Nigeria dish made using dried, shredded cassava. You can eat it as a snack or a full meal.

menus.title: Meat pie
menus.para: meat pie is a pie with a filling of meat and often other savory ingredients. They are found in cuisines worldwide

menus.title: Puff Puff
menus.para: Puff-puff, as it is called in Nigeria and Sierra Leone, sometimes Ghana, and in anglophone Cameroon, is a traditional African snack made of fried dough.
